revised_title: Resource Development in Semi-Arid Lands: Challenges and Prospects
tldr: The author discusses the challenges and prospects of resource development in semi-arid lands, emphasizing the importance of understanding socio-economic factors, environmental instability, and the need for viable national development policies. They also highlight the role of new technology and ecological complementarity in improving resource use and agricultural development in these regions.
